column7: Moderate water holding capacity, free from coarse sand, gravel, stones, have a uniform texture and should be deep.
Sandy to moderately heavy loam soil.
Thrive in well-drained, loamy soils with good organic matter.
Light to heavy loamy soils, good drainage.
Clayey loam soil, rich in humus, efficient drainage.
Sandy loam to Clayey loam soils, very deep, well drained.
Grows well in fertile alluvial soils, particularly in areas with adequate water availability.
Prefers well-drained sandy or loamy soils.
Thrive in well-drained loamy soils with good fertility.
Grows well in well-drained sandy loam or loamy soils.
Prefers well-drained sandy loam or loamy soils.
